mapper.sql: id, jiaoyu_type, jiaoyu_type_id, remark, bumen, bumen_id, user_id, user_name, flag, type, status, create_time, jaoyu_time
mapper.select: SELECT id, jiaoyu_type_id, ( SELECT a.NAME FROM type_info a WHERE a.id = c.jiaoyu_type_id ) jiaoyu_type, remark, bumen, bumen_id, user_id, ( SELECT a.NAME FROM sys_user a WHERE a.user_id = c.user_id ) user_name, flag, type, STATUS, create_time, jaoyu_time, DATE_FORMAT( jaoyu_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s" ) startTimeStr from jiaoyu_info c where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into jiaoyu_info (id, jiaoyu_type, jiaoyu_type_id, remark, bumen, bumen_id, user_id, user_name, flag, type, status, create_time, jaoyu_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jiaoyuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jiaoyuTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jaoyuTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update jiaoyu_info
jiaoyu_type = #{jiaoyuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jiaoyu_type_id = #{jiaoyuTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bumen = #{bumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
jaoyu_time = #{jaoyuTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
